course_description: Using technology tools to measure and evaluate data, students will apply advancements in informatics to construct data for care transformation and improved health care outcomes. Data analytics will be used to inform leadership on patient care issues, guiding creative innovation through demonstration projects.
sections: Class Nbr: 1763, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: Simpson/SWANSON, Status: Open
